item.title: Reentrant melting and multiple occupancy crystals of bounded potentials: Simple theory and direct observation by molecular dynamics simulations
item.description:
Visualisation of crystals forming in a fluid using a Generalized exponential (GEM-m) pair potential with m = 4 at a temperature of T = 0.4
using 3456 particles.
